remarks: Version of ~ bj-vtoclg1f with a dv condition on ` x , V ` .  This removes dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab .  Prefer its use over ~ bj-vtoclg1f when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ).  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-vtoclg1fv.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-vtoclg1fv.maj $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-vtoclg1fv.min $e |- ph $.
bj-vtoclg1fv $p |- ( A e. V -> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
